Producer: Brad Allen, Martin Michael, Chuck Howard
Screenwriter: Brad Allen, Chuck Howard, Martin Michael
Rating: PG-13 (Some Drug Material|Mature Thematic Content|Disturbing Images|Violence)
Synopsis: A refugee's escape, a prisoner's promise, and a daughter's painful secret converge. As three fathers fight to save their families, their lives become intertwined in an unlikely journey across the globe.
Title: Beautifully Broken
